text:
Conveniently located underneath my block, I didn’t think much of a neighbourhood clinic.
After my first visit, I was pleasantly surprised at the professional level of the care team.
Dr Ong is a detailed and knowledgeable doctor.
He cares and gives sound advice to patients especially the elderly.
The assistants at the reception are helpful and kind.

Was looking for a clinic with evening hours and found this clinic. What a wonderful experience from the phone call to confirm opening hours (receptionist was cheerful and helpful) to consult with dr tang who was patient, caring, and spot on with her diagnosis. Am on the way to recovery!
Dr  tang lai Lee gives me positivity throughout. Seeks all my issues clearly then helps me. Best clinic in neighbourhood. Highly recommended.
friendly and helpful nurses and great doctor who put us at ease when doing my child’s vaccination. not crowded too…which is great for us!
I had left meds in NZ. Was seen quickly and my issue speedily resolved. Very friendly staff.
